greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Prime number spiral (clockwise, East spoke).
comment: 8-spoke wheel overlays prime number spiral; hub is 2 in shell 0; 8 spokes radiate from this hub; this is East, clockwise.
link: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
example: Begin a prime number spiral at shell 0 (prime 2), proceed clockwise, East.
results.author: _Enoch Haga_, and _G. L. Honaker, Jr._, Apr 10 2000
ext: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 25 2002
